value.title: Fixing Time Calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows why you may hit some issues with time calculations and how to fix time. He typically sees this when using a Data Warehouse.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)
